item.title: [pi] command help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:2, topic:406781”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=503644.msg3685846#msg3685846 date=1311833779]
[b][size=25pt]You are all idiots.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("bank")) { if(c.inDeadVU()) { c.sendMessage("You can't bank in Dead vs Undead!"); return; } else { c.getPA().openUpBank(); } }
[/quote][/quote]
nuh uh i’m retarded

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] command help
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:7, topic:406644”][quote author=mrpyro3 link=topic=503644.msg3684607#msg3684607 date=1311769999]

Heres how i wud do it
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“bank”) && (!c.indeadVU)){
(open bank coomand)
else if(c.inDeadVU)
(send messsage
}

(just add the stuff like open bank command…im on ipod atm and dont want to type :p)

That would give errors, anyways I found a different way to do it.
[/quote]
That’s for Delta.
PI:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && c.indeadVU)) { c.sendMessage("Your not aloud to bank in this area, Sorry for any inconvenience."); } else { c.getPA.openUpBank(); }[/quote]

How is that for Delta when DeadVU isn’t even in the files. Also there is atleast 4things wrong with that coding.

I thought this was common knowledge.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] command help
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

Hello everyone, I’m trying to make it so you can’t bank in a certain area. Will this command work? if (playerCommand.startsWith("bank")) { && if(c.inDeadVU()) c.sendMessage("You can't bank in Dead vs Undead!"); } else { c.getPA().openUpBank(); } }

Read full topic
